hero.title: AMAR Engine
hero.subtitle: Advanced Multi-dimensional Augmented Reality Engine
hero.description: A reality mapping and physical reconstruction system with triple-path convergence architecture

about.title: About AMAR Engine
about.description: AMAR Engine (AME) is a cutting-edge reality mapping and physical reconstruction system designed to bridge the gap between virtual and physical worlds. With its innovative triple-path convergence architecture, AME offers unprecedented capabilities for creating immersive augmented reality experiences.

path1.title: Path 1: Perception & Mapping
path1.description: Real-time environmental scanning and 3D mapping capabilities that capture the physical world with precision.

path2.title: Path 2: Digital Twin Creation
path2.description: Generates accurate digital representations of physical environments and objects.

path3.title: Path 3: Augmented Reality Integration
path3.description: Seamlessly integrates virtual elements into the physical world for immersive experiences.

metaclass.title: Metaclass System
metaclass.description: A flexible and extensible system for defining and managing complex data structures and relationships.

aeid.title: AEID System
aeid.description: Advanced Entity Identification system that uniquely identifies and tracks entities across different domains.

skills.title: Skills System
skills.description: A modular system for adding and managing capabilities and behaviors to entities.

real-time.title: Real-time Processing
real-time.description: High-performance processing capabilities for real-time mapping and rendering.

docs.title: Documentation
docs.description: Explore our comprehensive documentation to learn how to use and extend AMAR Engine.

scanner.title: AME Scanner
scanner.description: Spatial skeleton capture with density collapse processing and OBB fitting, providing geometric constraints for entities.

engine.title: AMAR ENGINE
engine.description: System core with Normalization Center (Admin), integrating metaclass, AEID, and skills systems.

genis.title: AMAR GENIS
genis.description: Physics engine and executor of physical laws, implementing physical instantiation and behavior simulation.

triple-path.title: Triple-Path Convergence Architecture
triple-path.description: Collapses data from three heterogeneous paths (3DGS, Media Input, LLM API) into a single physical entity.

metaclass.title: Metaclass System
metaclass.description: Genetic genes of the system, with evolutionary logic from concrete to abstract to self-consistent.

physical-handle.title: Physical Handle Binding
physical-handle.description: Implements asynchronous coupling between the 3DGS visual layer and physical collision layer.

real-time-injection.title: Real-time Metaclass Injection
real-time-injection.description: Enables real-time changes to an object's physical constants without restarting the simulation.

digital-twin.title: Digital Twin
digital-twin.description: Create digital twins of the real world with physical authority, enabling real physical interactions.

virtual-reality.title: Virtual Reality
virtual-reality.description: Build VR environments with real physical interactions, providing immersive experiences.

game-development.title: Game Development
game-development.description: Provide more realistic physics simulation and object interactions, enhancing the realism of games.

robotics.title: Robotics Simulation
robotics.description: Provide realistic physical environment simulation for robots, accelerating robot development and testing.

education.title: Education and Training
education.description: Create interactive physical experiment environments, providing intuitive learning experiences.
